About

Simple Counter is a tally counter for Android. It makes counting easier. You can have multiple counters with their own names and values. Values can be changed using volume buttons.

This is an open-source application. Source code is hosted on GitHub at https://github.com/Tsukanov/Simple-Counter/.

It is my first Android application. The goal was to make something useful (at least for myself) and easy to build. Feel free to suggest a new feature on UserVoice, or submit bug report on GitHub.

I hope you\'ll find this app useful. If you have some free time, please, rate this app in Play Store.

Contributing

Feel free to make improvements and create pull requests. If you want to help with translation go to project\'s page on Crowdin. You can suggest new feature on UserVoice.
